# ReadMe Generator

  ## Description
  Application that generates a readme from the commandline!
  ## Table of Contents

  * [Installation](#installation)
  * [Usage](#usage)
  * [Credits](#credits)
  * [License](#license)
  
  ## Installation
  
          npm install

  ## Usage

  Run from the command line in order to generate a readme given a template.
